event.executesql: EXEC MSDB.dbo.sp_send_dbMail @profile_name = 'ExternalEmail' ,@from_address = 'Woodforest Treasury Management <Treasurymgmt@WOODFOREST.com>' ,@recipients = 'kim.alexander@pinnstrat.com;veronica.garcia@pinnstrat.com;shirley.hicks@pinnstrat.com' ,@reply_to = 'Treasurymgmt@woodforest.com' ,@copy_recipients = '' ,@subject = '[SEND SECURE] Daily Wire Detail Report' ,@body = '' ,@file_attachments = '\\woodforest.net\jobs\reports\PinnacleWireDetailByAccount.xls'
